message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to let it go for $12000. What do you think?
That's a great price, but unfortunately, it's a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only offer $8000 right now. What do you think?
I understand that $8000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $10000, and that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate you coming down to $10000, but I'm still a bit over budget. I'm really hoping to make this work, but I can only go up to $9000. If that's not acceptable, I might have to look elsewhere.

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. I can do $9500, and that's the lowest I can go. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9000 and $10000. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit too high. I'm hoping we can find a middle ground. I'm willing to go up to $9250. This is my final offer, and if it's not acceptable, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go above $9500. I can meet you halfway between $9250 and $9500, so I'm willing to do $9375. That's as low as I can go. What do you think?
